verses.text:
\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*. I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* with \add my\add* whole \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, in the \w assembly|strong="H5475"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, and \add in\add* the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*.  +  r 111.1  t Praise ye…: Heb. Hallelujah *

The \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add are\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, sought \w out|strong="H1875"\w* of all them that have \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* therein.

His \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \add is\add* \w honourable|strong="H1935"\w* and \w glorious|strong="H1926"\w*: and his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w endureth|strong="H5975"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

He hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* his wonderful \w works|strong="H6381"\w* to be \w remembered|strong="H2143"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w* and full of \w compassion|strong="H7349"\w*.

He hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w meat|strong="H2964"\w* unto them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him: he will \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* be \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* of his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.\f + \fr 111.5 \ft meat: Heb. prey\f*

He hath \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* the \w power|strong="H3581"\w* of his \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, that he may \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them the \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.

The \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add are\add* \w verity|strong="H0571"\w* and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; all his \w commandments|strong="H6490"\w* \add are\add* \w sure|strong="H0539"\w*.

They stand \w fast|strong="H5564"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \add and are\add* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* and \w uprightness|strong="H3477"\w*.\f + \fr 111.8 \ft stand…: Heb. are established\f*

He \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w redemption|strong="H6304"\w* unto his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: he hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* and \w reverend|strong="H3372"\w* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

The \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w understanding|strong="H7922"\w* have all they that \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add his commandments:\add* his \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w endureth|strong="H5975"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.\f + \fr 111.10 \ft a good…: or, good success\f*\f + \fr 111.10 \ft his commandments: Heb. them\f*
